website_summaries.verdict: While it's a good choice for novice cooks who are concerned about value, its known flaws/limitations might frustrate advanced cooks.
pros: Offers quick, even heating and reliable non-stick cooking at a budget-friendly price
cons: Though spacious, the pan is shallow
Temperature dial is awkwardly close to the cooking unit
Cord doesn't detach, making it difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Glass lid exploded!
customer_reviews.text: This wok just arrived yesterday and I had unpacked it and placed it on the counter. This morning I heard a loud explosion and went in the kitchen to find that the lid had completely shattered and glass was EVERYWHERE! Thank goodness this didn't happen while we were in the kitchen, or cooking with it!! Scary!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone and I get nothing but compliments about it. I’m told it’s super easy to clean and is lightweight. The person I bought it for uses it almost daily and cant get enough of it. Glad to hear this is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: phantombirdie

customer_reviews.title: Wok burnt out in July
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wok in January of this year to replace a wok that I had for over 20 years and figure it's time to get a more up to date and maybe safer in terms of coating. I used the new wok every week. It did a great job of heating and cooking various dishes. But in July while cooking a dish, the wok blew a fuse and stopped working altogether even after I reset the fuse. Other appliances were tested & work in the same wall socket. So I'm really surprised and disappointed that this wok could last beyond a year.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This wok is the most used appliance in my kitchen. Its big enough for family dinners and nice enough to use as a serving dish and keeps food warm as well. A great price point for a good quality product. The non-stick coating keeps food from sticking (even burnt on food )
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Broke before first use
customer_reviews.text: Product comes shipped with the lid handle inverted requiring you to unscrew the assembly, move the handle from underneath the lid to the top of the lid and screw it back in. Screw broke upon mild hand tightening. QC non existant. Think about purchasing a different product.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love this wok!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this Wok? It is PERFECT. Its huge so I have a lot of room to stir fry my foods, it heats up to a nice hot temp to make sure my veggies cook quickly and stay crisp. I have been wanting a good wok for a long time, and I have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my brother and his wife. They were very excited to use it. They both said it worked great the first time they used it and that they love it. My only gripe was shipping. I wish it had come in a shipping box instead of just the wok box. As a result, the.box was damaged in shipping and the shipping label was stuck to it. Not real great when giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: N. McBride

customer_reviews.title: Electric Wok. Where's the temperature markings?
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice Electric Wok. However, the dial that regulates the cooking temperature has no temperatures written on it. So it's very difficult to know exactly what the temperature is that needs to be set. This is the bad part of it. I am going Blind and I wish it would have had the numbers on it instead of just lines that have to be counted. Keep this in mind if you are thinking of buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lt. Robert T. Jeffcoat Sr.

customer_reviews.title: A Wok For All Seasons
customer_reviews.text: I thought they stopped making woks in the 1980s- boy was I surprised to still see them still around. This model has a nice temperature adjustment and very easy to clean with it's non-stick surface. Though it looks a bit like a UFO, it does a fantastic job in the stir frying realm- and I can't sing it's praises enough.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Salniker

customer_reviews.title: Does not even get hot enough to cook in!
customer_reviews.text: This was a return for us. Took forever to cook a few pieces of chicken. Temp at hottest part of wok only reached about 275 degrees as we tested temp with a thermal thermometer. Pretty much useless. The sides of the wok were not even hot. Maybe ours was defective or maybe this is how they all are. Cannot recommend!
customer_reviews.author: michigander12

customer_reviews.title: Perfecct
customer_reviews.text: This Wok is a great size and it really heats up fast. I love the non-stick surface, just make sure you don't use metal utensils. It really gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Bama Mama

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at how well it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the wok is easy to clean as it has a non-stick surface. I like that it heated up quickly. Its easy to use and I may find myself using most days. So happy with this wok! Toastygirl
customer_reviews.author: toastygirl

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The lid's "adjustable steam control" doesn't work. Tried fixing. It just spins around and builds up water underneath. Very annoying. The wok is heavier than I thought, I cannot maneuver with one hand to spoon out the leftover food, wash, etc. Purchased a larger size for bigger food portions but didn't anticipate the awkward size and weight. I removed the removable base for easier washing and haven't been able to get it back together yet. I have used many other woks. I would not buy this product again. Unfortunately, I bought at a busy time so didn't get a chance to try it before realizing I would want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie F. Colano

customer_reviews.title: Defective; poor design
customer_reviews.text: Two major issues with this wok: the lid doesn't fit - large caps between the lid and the wok body; once the base is detached, it's nearly impossible to re-attach. For the latter, I tried for a solid 15 minutes and gave up in frustration. Came back to it an hour later with the same results. Clear design flaw. My recommendation is to find another wok. This one is being returned today.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Wok is too small however the biggest issue is that it's way under powered in wattage to stir fry food in the classic japanesse method. It DOES NOT recover quickly when the food is added. Don't event think about using it to cook shrimp tempura even with a minimal amount of oil. The unit is sturdy and well made just under powered. Sending my back today.
customer_reviews.author: John Schlachter

customer_reviews.title: I like how it works
customer_reviews.text: I like how it works. I'm still learning how to adjust the temperature to what food I'm cooking. Only downside is you can't detach the power cord to wash this wok. It's not the most durable but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: T. C.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't give a review about the features. The knob off of the lid broke IMMEDIATELY. AROMA really needs to address that issue. My fault; I was hoping the problem that I saw other reviewers had would avoid me. If I were YOU I would look to buying something else...
customer_reviews.author: KEVrater

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. I agree with the other reviews that there seems to be no difference in temperature settings, it's either on or off. It heats up very quickly so be careful. I also agree that the power cord is too short. I've used it many times for both stir fry and fried rice. It's also pretty large so be sure you have enough counter space. Overall I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Wok
customer_reviews.text: Heats up nearly instantly. Has thicker metal, than ones I have had before, owned two other electric Woks. Definitively gives you control of the temperature. I use it almost daily. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NDSUWAYNE

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast. The food all cooked evenly and nothing stuck. Cleaning is easy because you are able to detach the base. I do wish that the knob had temperatures on it but it seems like the new woks don’t. I really like that it comes with a glass lid so you’re able to see the food without removing the lid each time. You can also vent the lid if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Labrador Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to pulling this out and using it for fried rice. The head of the screw to hold the handle onto the lid was sheared off when we unboxed it. On the highest setting it never got hot enough to actually stir-fry the rice. I was able to touch the side of the wok for several seconds without actually burning my skin. Waste of money, wasted my time, and no dinner to show for any of it. Looking over the other negative reviews, I'm not sure what I was thinking ordering this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Misty D. Reynolds-Dormer

customer_reviews.title: Base will not reattach
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use it since once I detached the base I could not reattach. I spent over one hour trying. Should not be that hard! Now I have to revert to sautéing in my Insta Pot since everything is ready to go (meat marinated, vegetables cut up).
customer_reviews.author: Michele Roosli

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: the wok looks better online than in person. I used it for the first time and was not impressed with it at all. I will be giving it to my mom she will have better use for it and it will fit better in her kitchen for my kitchen "countertop is small" I will get a much smaller wok.
customer_reviews.author: charisse vega

customer_reviews.title: It is FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: We bought it as a father's Day gift for my husband. He loves it. A local store offered the same at ALMOST DOUBLE the price. We have used it very much. the featured with the tempura rack are brilliant. Best Gift this year.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Catalina Egan

customer_reviews.title: A WOK you must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wok I bought from Macy's and love it! but I wanted one outside at my outdoor area. Love how fast it heats up and easy to clean. Just be careful on the bottom piece when you separate it from the wok, its the round disc, it can be sharp. But other that that this wok is amazing to use!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rome

customer_reviews.title: wok does NOT get nearly hot enough for proper asian cooking
customer_reviews.text: I should have researched much deeper about electric woks. The size of this wok is fine for my needs, though it does not get nearly hot enough to quickly sear meats and meld flavors of different seasonings and oils. It cleans easily and I hope the non stick surface does not begin to peel off, Save your money, find a better model with more heat availability, Also, the heating element heats only the bottom of the pan, not the sides, Ill not return this because i hate the hassle of doing so, i believe it will be given to Good Will as soon as i find a 'new' one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old wok!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wok to replace an almost 20 year old fancy electric wok. This is a no frills wok and it works great. The pan is more gently sloped than my old wok and it allows the food to cook more evenly. It gets good and hot for quick cooking and the veg retains the right amount of crunch. My husband says it cleans up easily. (The cook doesn’t do dishes.) I’m very pleased with this moderately priced wok.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyD

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, excellent non-stick surface, heats evenly, has a nice traditional wok shape inside - no flat spot on the bottom. Very happy with it. My only minor gripe is that the heat control just has smaller to larger dots rather than some estimate of actual temperature; get used to it and it's fine. Be aware: the wok is large, so storage can be a problem. I use it so often that it just lives on my counter top. Actually, it usually lives on my glass stove top which I'm using much less often since I got this wok.
customer_reviews.author: anonymess

customer_reviews.title: Cord connection is Very Loose.
customer_reviews.text: Where the plug control inserts the connection is quite loose. The temperature knob is inaccurate and in the "off" position the element still is "on." The temperature is hard to control and the lowest setting can get very hot. Very unlike our electric skillet where "off" means off and the connection is secure. Truly wish we had purchased a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Faye A.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clean an works well. It is good quality. When the item arrived one of the handles was loose and one screw was in the box. Very easy to fix but they should tighten the handles better.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and start using. The only thing is you have to clean it immediately after use of it can be very difficult to clean. Overall it’s a great buy for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Best way to Wok
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement from my older one, steam, stir fry, deep fry. This is the best you'll buy. My last identical one lasted 8 years with heavy usage. You won't be disappointed this Aroma electric Wok is the best. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MeOldMan

customer_reviews.title: The best wok
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this nonstick electric wok for about 6 months now -- I like it's large size, as I can cook for a large group, and serve it from the wok itself because it looks nice on the kitchen island. Temperature control is excellent, and it's very easy to clean. I would recommend this highly. I bought a second one and gave it to my daughter, who loves to cook.
customer_reviews.author: regee

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy use, easy cleanup, easy serving from directly on table. Sturdy construction. I plan to get another for our winter home down south, replace the big, bulky, hard to clean, one currently there.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Aroma Housewares AEW-305 Electric Wok, Black
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Wished the plug-in would come off to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Read for Fun

customer_reviews.title: Just one complaint
customer_reviews.text: This is mostly a great product. The only demerit is that it heats only from the bottom. You have to be diligent in keeping food moving, or it will stick and scorch.
customer_reviews.author: dkeephus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a similar wok with similar features ....for less than half the price! I like that this has a removable base for ease of cleaning (just as the twice as expensive competitive model did). Have used this item for close to a month with no issues. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Electric Wok
customer_reviews.text: I liked the durability the ease of cleaning and the even way it cooks. No waiting for it to get hot or uneven cooking or slow heat going off and on steady heat cooks fast and fantastic. The glass lid and the wok are really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Green

customer_reviews.title: Need to know how to cook without temperature settings
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly found out the hard way burned my fingers don't buy the professional one the 35 does it just as well cooking my Chinese food at home now works great only draw back goes from low to high no biggie for me some people like what the temp is and clean up is a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Christian H Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Very convent. Very hot good appliance
customer_reviews.text: Larger than what I thought it would be. Heated up fast Adding after having fir a while—-this is an awesome unit. I haven’t used my stove since I got this It heats up sooo fast. Cooks anything Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wok is awesome. Cooks everything perfectly and is super easy to clean. I've had it about three months now. My cats pushed it off the counter and it still worked. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, the only issue is the non stick coating ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Great, the only issue is the non stick coating is coming off, I followed directions and season the pan, it should not be doing this after only 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase/Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten Woks in the past and I wasn't happy with the heating. Flip side, for this to be an electric Wok, it heats up so fast (GREAT perk to making a quick stir fry meal). I enjoyed cooking with it, cleaning was easy and storage was not bad (put it in a cabinet or leave it out in a place of its own in your kitchen (good look). I can't toot this product enough! Thank you! R.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wok..
customer_reviews.text: Stir fried several times and love it..Can’t wait to make tempura!
customer_reviews.author: Mariann Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Christmas present. This is my second electric wok. So far I like it. I am still learning how to use the various levels of heat. This heats up very quickly. It was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love the wok, hate the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a wok with a cover for years. I finally settled on this model and ordered it. When it arrived, the handle was broken. I did not want to wait for a replacment so we used it. LOVE how well it cooked the food, nothing stuck like it did in our old wok. We do lots of stir fry, so it was amazing to clean and food cooked up nicely. I highly recommend the product despite poor packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen must have
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these for 5 years and use it 4 to 5 times a week. I just bought one for my single son and he loves it as well
customer_reviews.author: K Wright

customer_reviews.title: I loved be cooking in this wok
customer_reviews.text: I loved be cooking in this wok! It’s a great product, has held up to repeated use, and makes for great dinners with friends while you cook at the table instead of over at the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice medium size Wok
customer_reviews.text: We had trouble in the stores trying to find a medium size wok as all the stores seem to only sell the same larger (and more expensive)wok. For cooking for two to four people, the Aroma AEW-306 is the perfect size, and in the few uses so far it appears to work just fine. The only negative is that its electrical power controller is graduated with numbers from cold to hot, rather than with degrees, so one has to learn what number to set if order to approximate the required cooking temperature. Not a big problem, but still a bother.
customer_reviews.author: M. Filler

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product was very well packaged and arrived in excellent condition. And we love it. It is so very easy to use and we have already used it a number of times. I would recommend this product to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Product is lightweight and easy to use. Work wonders when cook. Love the temperature gauge Plenty of space to cook. Easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a wok and this was supposed to be one of the top ones. My wife cringes every time I mention stir fry. The temperature is not consistent and comes on then goes off. We spend one minute cooking and 5 minutes waiting for it to come back on. Will be looking for a better one real soon.
customer_reviews.author: Norman R Aven

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this wok. Cleans easy and cooks food perfect. I think reviews from some people are new to cooking because I’ve had zero issues
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Giaccone

customer_reviews.title: Great gift Idea, useful for all kinds of cooking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a college student. She prefers it to her more expensive pans, since it has such amazingly easy clean up. She says it's simple to use and she cooks just about everything in this pan. The non stick cooking allows for quick, healthy, and easy meals, and the temperature control is useful when trying to follow a recipe. It's not just for Asian cooking, make donuts or french fries if you want to, without worrying about how hot your oil is, as you would on a stove top. It's holding up very well, and a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shirts

customer_reviews.title: Best WOK I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Had for several months and have done quite a few stir fry meals in this. It works incredibly well. One of my best purchases without a doubt. Would recommend this to anyone looking for this type of cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Middaugh

customer_reviews.title: We're cooking stir fry now
customer_reviews.text: Super nice. Big. Gets hot fast. Has temperature dial to set the desired temp on the plug. Vented glass lid so you can see what's cooking. Added bonus large chop sticks to pick fried items out of oil, tempura rack fits neatly on the side and steamer rack too.
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: boils water so fast it crazy
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing as i cook litterally everything from pancakes to grilled cheese
customer_reviews.author: Artemia

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Worked great. It does seem a little cheaply made but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and cooks well. The whole thing heats up. My only complaint is sometimes it seems like I need to up the heat to get things to temperature when it was boiling 10 seconds ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cjcc

customer_reviews.title: Temperature controls
customer_reviews.text: Temperature controls are hard to regulate. cools down in the middle of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Wok time
customer_reviews.text: it works just as well as a traditional wok. Made chicken fried rice and it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: My husband is happy with it, and he's the cook, so that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.text: it works, it's great. It makes yummy food. The controls are confusing as hell, however... I wish it gave actual real temperatures instead of just numbers, but we make it work. I think we cook everything at about 8+ on this. The "warm" setting doesn't keep things warm for too long, but enough for most people to be able to grab food out of it if they need to. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase - a great price for a nice electric wok.
customer_reviews.author: Shay VanZwoll

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Best thing I could have bought. My shrimp fried rice was delicious
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the steamer shelf, it scratched the pan and I couldn't get a hold of customer service at all. So I have a pan that's got huge scratches from using it properly
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I've beat this work uo...left it outside in the rein, fallen, burnt stuff to it and it's still working!
customer_reviews.author: Snowpony

customer_reviews.title: Cooking and cleaning up made easy.
customer_reviews.text: Homemade Kung Pao Chicken and Pork Fried Rice. Excellent temperature control. Remove the base and whole unit can be immersed in water for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Rich McKimmie

customer_reviews.title: Temperature Goes Up and Down
customer_reviews.text: The temperature goes up and down while stir frying. Starts out just right, then quickly cools off. Turn it up and it gets too hot, then cools off again. The box was bent and taped up when I received it, as if it had been opened and repackaged. I'm guessing someone may have returned it. I regret that I did not do so as I am unhappy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Family size
customer_reviews.text: Heats up great and hold a lot of veggies and noodles.
customer_reviews.author: michael y.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wok in 2016 and use it almost daily and have had no problems whatsoever. Easy to clean and durable. My 12 y.o. and 16 y.o. sons make their eggs or fry up a steak with no problems. Other than a few scratches on the cooking surface the wok runs just as well as when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E. Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great Appliance
customer_reviews.text: Great Appliance, Easy everything including the detachable base. Lid has a stem release setting.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Capone

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great, Cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product, great price, amazing cooker, One of the best quality Woks I have purchased
customer_reviews.author: MCA729

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great!
customer_reviews.text: Our old wok quit several years ago. Tried out several since. Then we found this one and have been using it for 3 years, still love it! Bought this one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my wok!
customer_reviews.text: Love my wok! Easy to use and easy to clean !
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: This wok rocks
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for cooking in. I've cooked shrimp, chicken and pork in it. Use it about 3 times a month. Makes enough left overs for almost a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff kruse

customer_reviews.title: would prefer a removable electric unit, didn't realize that ...
customer_reviews.text: would prefer a removable electric unit, didn't realize that it was part of the wok, so makes it more difficult to clean. Cooks well.
customer_reviews.author: Loanguy

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick
customer_reviews.text: From steamed vegetables to Mexican rice to stir fry - excellent addition.
customer_reviews.author: w m tilson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Wok
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wok - very easy to clean - comes apart on base - goes into DW - great temp control - glass see-thru lid is super -- this wok has a medium depth yet it's wide enough to prepare some big meals - would highly recommend this one :o)
customer_reviews.author: Diane B.

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick flakes off
customer_reviews.text: The non-stick coating flakes off. I have not used any metal in this wok only wooden. I have had to stop using as too worried about the non-stick coating getting into my food. Sad because it is a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this wok
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son to use in his college dorm kitchen. He loves how easy it is to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance to have
customer_reviews.text: Great Chinese electric wok I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our cookware. We use it a lot. Especially my step-daugher. We have had for a while now and not one problem has arose. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wyld Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitchen Appliance I have purchased in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted an electric wok. I hesitated buying one because I thought it would be just another appliance that would collect dust or get passed on to my kids. I was so wrong. It is the best appliance I have bought in years, and I cannot believe how easy it is to use. It takes just minutes to prepare a great meal and it is large enough for company. Cleanup is a breeze and the non stick surface just wipes out easily. I recommend this Aroma product to all my friends and to any one who is checking the reviews. A must-have in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sally N.

customer_reviews.title: great product for a great price.  not perfect but close
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother and she loves it. The only caveat is the cord is attached so its not the easiest to clean. It would have been prefered to have easy removal of electric cord to make it easier to clean. Other than that it's a wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Shane arellano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has just ben 1 year and the coating non stick inside is peeling off and I don't even use any hard spoons. I use only silicone stirrers . It started with a small peel off now it has gone to almost $ size coin.
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: Switched over to stovetop
customer_reviews.text: Did not get hot enough. Everytime I added an item the temperature never got hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: sierra shope

customer_reviews.title: It works very well and is easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: It works very well and is easy to use and clean. Just remember to unplug it before you try to move it to the sink...especially when it still has food in it. My bad! Also, would love to see a 15" tempura rack to fit this model. A 14" will not work and very slightly scratched the non-stick coating when I tried to use it. Other than that, I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Phlerbert

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wok
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new one. My old one lasted 12 years and I probably use it twice a week. Very dependable. The top and bottom separate for cleaning. The only problem I had with the old one was the non stick coating coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Everyone should buy one. I'm stir frying everything. I'm obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The Wok was delivered on time, but the base was bent so lid didn't fit correctly. The good news was that the metal it is made with is thin and bendable, so we could reshape it. This was a gift for my Mother and she didn't want me to return it. I think if it had been for myself, I would have returned it for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: StellaQ

customer_reviews.title: The best wok or cooking ware I had ever own
customer_reviews.text: The best wok or cooking ware I had ever own. Cook fast. Non-stick. Light weight. Easy to carry outside and cook outdoor, especially when I fry something. I wouldn't want the fry smell to stay in my house. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Good Wok
customer_reviews.text: This wok is very good for someone who does not have a gas stove. The temperature seems to stay even and it cooks very well. The only drawback is that the cord does not detach. When washing, the cord get in the way. Other than that, it is very functional.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: slow heet
customer_reviews.text: i was bummed to turn this unit on high and it heets up then cools off heets up cools off, takes forever to cook stir fry )o; after several months of using. It never got better. Terrible waste of money. Im ready to toss it in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Shellie HAll

customer_reviews.title: wHAT TOOK ME SO LONG TO BUY THIS!!??
customer_reviews.text: I've had other electric woks but nothing as good as this one. The food cooks evenly. I really enjoy using this wok.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: The food looks good and taste great
customer_reviews.text: With this wok, I tend to be creative. The food looks good and taste great. Now I eat more vegetables and less meat. Easy cleanup, too! This wok won't last forever. But when the time comes, I'll purchase a new one.
customer_reviews.author: CompSpec#*

customer_reviews.title: ... for my wife and I so the size is perfect. So far I did Fried Rice and Fried ...
customer_reviews.text: It is just for my wife and I so the size is perfect. So far I did Fried Rice and Fried Veggies. Worked as well as I expected. An added bonus is the very easy clean-up after cooking. I would recommend this for any couple or small family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice wok
customer_reviews.text: Best one I have ever had. Easy to clean, heats quickly and works wonderfully. I would not want to be without it. If you get it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melany

customer_reviews.title: Great electric wok
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric wok so I can't compare to others but I do really love it. The electric wok is so much easier to work with and heats up much hotter than the wok I used to use on my stove. It takes a lot of stress out of cooking, in my opinion. Food doesn't stick to this and clean-up is really easy. The power cord is easy to attach/detach.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: The wok was nice, but the handle for the lid was very ...
customer_reviews.text: The wok was nice, but the handle for the lid was very cheap and broke extremely easily, had to figure out a way to make my own handle.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Another gift, and the person I gave it to can’t stop raving about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kilbourn

customer_reviews.title: ... I ordered and it arrived on time an in excellent packing and condition
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered and it arrived on time an in excellent packing and condition. Super easy to use and it works great. Since it is not submersible, it is a bit cumbersome to clean. Game changer? No! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Haas

product_meta.title: Aroma Housewares AEW-305 Electric Wok, Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Basic ModelThis sleek metal wok from Aroma is designed to heat up quickly and retain its extreme heat as you cook; sealing in the flavor of your foods for professional results, every time. Full range temperature controls give great versatility. To make clean-up as easy as operation, the inside of the wok and domed lid are nonstick coated. Not just for stir-fry, it's also great for braising, steaming, and tempura. It's everything you need to make all your favorite modern and traditional Asian foods.

AMAZON.COM
Going to Mongolian grills and watching them prepare stir-fry right in front of you is always a treat, and now you can provide your guests with that same excitement with this electric wok. Simply put the wok on the table; let guests choose their favorite vegetables, meats, and tofu; and then get the dinner party livened up with some quick wokking right there! (Keep in mind that although the handles and base are heat-resistant, you'll probably want to set the wok on a cutting board to protect your tabletop.) 

 With a nonstick interior surface that heats up oil in a lightning-fast three minutes, the wok features a low-to-high continuous temperature control, giving you precise control over your cooking. Select a high temperature for lightning-quick stir fries, or the lower "warm" setting for serving. With a 6-1/2-quart capacity, it's easy to feed four or more. The nonstick interior is just right for cooking veggies and meats with less oil, although you'll need to avoid metal cooking utensils that could scratch the surface. Since the wok is not immersible, cleanup takes a bit of time with warm soapy water and a sponge. A lid and one-year warranty are included. --Ariel Meadow Stallings
feature_bullets: A classic must-have – the classic Dome-shape lid is perfect for any type of stir-fry, saute or simmer! The wide, Convex curve allows for excellent heat circulation for any dish you throw its way.
Nonstick coating – the smooth, nonstick coating allows for an effortless cooking experience Every time! No mess, no fuss. Just delicious food.
Spacious capacity – with two different size options (aew-305 at 7Q and AEW-306 at 5Q) you are sure to always have enough space for your creative cooking endeavors.
Large 7 quart capacity with high domed lid
Rapid heat-up with consistent heat retention
